channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Toilet left on corner of street, 10th December
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped a toilet at this corner of ramsgate and atlas mews. There are often things fly tipped here, so I'm sure council is familiar with spot.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ramsgate Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Domestic waste placed in bins, 10th December
item.description:

item.title: Lime bike dumped on Bravington rd w9, 10th December
item.description:
Lime scooter dumped outside 108/110 bravington Road London W93AT yet again. Someone is continually dumping a lime scooter here and it’s been dumped here for weeks then intermittently used and dumped here again. I’m not going to look for it’s number as it’s not safe to do that around here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Bravington Road, Kensal Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
